author: dgaudet
msg: - ap_writev() should be available even if the os doesn't support writev.
- document the multiple result code behaviour of read/write/writev
- move the documentation from file_io/unix/readwrite.c to include/apr_file_io.h

author: dgaudet
msg: - fix a case where a byte could have been read (via unget) and it wasn't
- read(2) semantics is that 0 is EOF, doesn't matter what type of file

author: stoddard
msg: Win32: tweak return codes in ap_stat() to canonicalize the most common codes

author: stoddard
msg: Win32: A few more tweaks to the late binding code as suggested by Greg Stein
